title: neevE nanu
sahitya:
nIvE nannu brOvavalenamma kadambavana nilayuniki nijamaina kommA

anupallavi

 dEvI mInAkSi sukha vANi talli sakala dEvatulu nutiyinci rANi purANi

caraNam

 sharaNu joccina nannu karuNimpavE krSNa rAmasvAmi vEnkaTaramaNa vashamugAnika nAdu
madhurApurini kIrti galadika sajjanula stharaiNa janula gUDi nelakonu shrI mInAkSi
